verses.verse: After <WG3326> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> there was a feast <WG1859> of the Jews, <WG2453> and Jesus <WG2424> went <WG305> up to Jerusalem. <WG2414>

Now <WG1161> there is in Jerusalem <WG2414> by the sheep <WG4262> [gate] a pool, <WG2861> which is called <WG1951> in Hebrew <WG1447> Bethesda, <WG964> having <WG2192> five <WG4002> porticoes. <WG4745>

In these <WG3778> lay <WG2621> a multitude <WG4128> of those <WG3588> who were sick, <WG770> blind, <WG5185> lame, <WG5560> and withered, <WG3584> [waiting <WG1551> for the moving <WG2796> of the waters; <WG5204>

for an angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> went <WG2597> down <WG2597> at certain <WG2596> seasons <WG2540> into the pool, <WG2861> and stirred <WG5015> up the water; <WG5204> whoever then <WG3767> first, <WG4413> after <WG3326> the stirring <WG5016> up of the water, <WG5204> stepped <WG1684> in was made <WG1096> well <WG5199> from whatever <WG3739> <WG1221> disease <WG3553> with which <WG3739> he was afflicted. <WG2722>]
And a certain <WG5100> man <WG444> was there, <WG1563> who had been <WG2192> thirty-eight years <WG2094> in his sickness. <WG769>

When Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG3708> him lying <WG2621> there, and knew <WG1097> that he had already <WG2235> been <WG2192> a long <WG4183> time <WG5550> [in that condition,] He said <WG3004> to him, "Do you wish <WG2309> to get <WG1096> well <WG5199>?"

The sick <WG770> man answered <WG611> Him, "Sir, <WG2962> I have <WG2192> no <WG3756> man <WG444> to put <WG906> me into the pool <WG2861> when <WG3752> the water <WG5204> is stirred <WG5015> up, but while <WG1722> <WG3739> I am coming, <WG2064> another <WG243> steps <WG2597> down <WG2597> before <WG4253> me."
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "Arise, <WG1453> take <WG142> up your pallet, <WG2895> and walk. <WG4043>"

And immediately <WG2112> the man <WG444> became <WG1096> well, <WG5199> and took <WG142> up his pallet <WG2895> and [began] to walk. <WG4043> Now <WG1161> it was the Sabbath <WG4521> on that day. <WG2250>

Therefore <WG3767> the Jews <WG2453> were saying <WG3004> to him who was cured, <WG2323> "It is the Sabbath, <WG4521> and it is not permissible <WG1832> for you to carry <WG142> your pallet. <WG2895>"
But he answered <WG611> them, "He who made <WG4160> me well <WG5199> was the one <WG1565> who said <WG3004> to me, 'Take <WG142> up your pallet <WG2895> and walk. <WG4043>'"
They asked <WG2065> him, "Who <WG5101> is the man <WG444> who said <WG3004> to you, 'Take <WG142> up [your pallet,] and walk <WG4043>' ?"
But he who was healed <WG2390> did not know <WG3609> who <WG5101> it was; for Jesus <WG2424> had slipped <WG1593> away <WG1593> while there was a crowd <WG3793> in [that] place. <WG5117>

Afterward <WG3326> <WG3778> Jesus <WG2424> found <WG2147> him in the temple, <WG2413> and said <WG3004> to him, "Behold, <WG2396> you have become <WG1096> well; <WG5199> do not sin <WG264> anymore, <WG3371> so <WG2443> that nothing <WG3361> <WG5100> worse <WG5501> may befall <WG1096> you."
The man <WG444> went <WG565> away, <WG565> and told <WG3004> the Jews <WG2453> that it was Jesus <WG2424> who had made <WG4160> him well. <WG5199>
And for this <WG3778> reason <WG1223> the Jews <WG2453> were persecuting <WG1377> Jesus, <WG2424> because <WG3754> He was doing <WG4160> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> on the Sabbath. <WG4521>
But He answered <WG611> them, "My Father <WG3962> is working <WG2038> until <WG2193> now, <WG737> and I Myself <WG1473> am working. <WG2038>"

For this <WG3778> cause <WG1223> therefore <WG3767> the Jews <WG2453> were seeking <WG2212> all the more <WG3123> to kill <WG615> Him, because <WG3754> He not only <WG3440> was breaking <WG3089> the Sabbath, <WG4521> but also <WG2532> was calling <WG3004> God <WG2316> His own <WG2398> Father, <WG3962> making <WG4160> Himself <WG1438> equal <WG2470> with God. <WG2316>

Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> answered <WG611> and was saying <WG3004> to them, "Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, the Son <WG5207> can <WG1410> do <WG4160> nothing <WG3756> <WG3762> of Himself, <WG1438> unless <WG302> <WG3361> [it is] something <WG5100> He sees <WG991> the Father <WG3962> doing; <WG4160> for whatever <WG3739> <WG302> [the Father] does, <WG4160> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> the Son <WG5207> also <WG2532> does <WG4160> in like <WG3668> manner. <WG3668>

"For the Father <WG3962> loves <WG5368> the Son, <WG5207> and shows <WG1166> Him all <WG3956> things <WG3956> that He Himself <WG846> is doing; <WG4160> and greater <WG3173> works <WG2041> than these <WG3778> will He show <WG1166> Him, that you may marvel. <WG2296>

"For just <WG5618> as the Father <WG3962> raises <WG1453> the dead <WG3498> and gives <WG2227> them life, <WG2227> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> the Son <WG5207> also <WG2532> gives <WG2227> life <WG2227> to whom <WG3739> He wishes. <WG2309>
"For not even <WG3761> the Father <WG3962> judges <WG2919> anyone, <WG3762> but He has given <WG1325> all <WG3956> judgment <WG2920> to the Son, <WG5207>

in order <WG2443> that all <WG3956> may honor <WG5091> the Son, <WG5207> even <WG2531> as they honor <WG5091> the Father. <WG3962> He who does not honor <WG5091> the Son <WG5207> does not honor <WG5091> the Father <WG3962> who sent <WG3992> Him.

"Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, he who hears <WG191> My word, <WG3056> and believes <WG4100> Him who sent <WG3992> Me, has <WG2192> eternal <WG166> life, <WG2222> and does not come <WG2064> into judgment, <WG2920> but has passed <WG3327> out of death <WG2288> into life. <WG2222>

"Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, an hour <WG5610> is coming <WG2064> and now <WG3568> is, when <WG3753> the dead <WG3498> shall hear <WG191> the voice <WG5456> of the Son <WG5207> of God; <WG2316> and those <WG3588> who hear <WG191> shall live. <WG2198>

"For just <WG5618> as the Father <WG3962> has <WG2192> life <WG2222> in Himself, <WG1438> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> He gave <WG1325> to the Son <WG5207> also <WG2532> to have <WG2192> life <WG2222> in Himself; <WG1438>
and He gave <WG1325> Him authority <WG1849> to execute <WG4160> judgment, <WG2920> because <WG3754> He is [the] Son <WG5207> of Man. <WG444>
"Do not marvel <WG2296> at this; <WG3778> for an hour <WG5610> is coming, <WG2064> in which <WG3739> all <WG3956> who <WG3588> are in the tombs <WG3419> shall hear <WG191> His voice, <WG5456>

and shall come <WG1607> forth; <WG1607> those <WG3588> who did <WG4160> the good <WG18> [deeds] to a resurrection <WG386> of life, <WG2222> those <WG3588> who committed <WG4238> the evil <WG5337> [deeds] to a resurrection <WG386> of judgment. <WG2920>

"I can <WG1410> do <WG4160> nothing <WG3756> <WG3762> on My own <WG1683> initiative. <WG1683> As I hear, <WG191> I judge; <WG2919> and My judgment <WG2920> is just, <WG1342> because <WG3754> I do not seek <WG2212> My own <WG1699> will, <WG2307> but the will <WG2307> of Him who sent <WG3992> Me.
"If <WG1437> I [alone] bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of Myself, <WG1683> My testimony <WG3141> is not true. <WG227>
"There is another <WG243> who bears <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of Me, and I know <WG3609> that the testimony <WG3141> which <WG3739> He bears <WG3140> of Me is true. <WG227>
"You have sent <WG649> to John, <WG2491> and he has borne <WG3140> witness <WG3140> to the truth. <WG225>
"But the witness <WG3141> which I receive <WG2983> is not from man, <WG444> but I say <WG3004> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> that you may be saved. <WG4982>
"He was the lamp <WG3088> that was burning <WG2545> and was shining <WG5316> and you were willing <WG2309> to rejoice <WG21> for a while <WG5610> in his light. <WG5457>

"But the witness <WG3141> which I have <WG2192> is greater <WG3173> than [that of] John; <WG2491> for the works <WG2041> which <WG3739> the Father <WG3962> has given <WG1325> Me to accomplish, <WG5048> the very <WG846> works <WG2041> that I do, <WG4160> bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of Me, that the Father <WG3962> has sent <WG649> Me.

"And the Father <WG3962> who sent <WG3992> Me, He has borne <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of Me. You have neither <WG3777> heard <WG191> His voice <WG5456> at any <WG4455> time, <WG4455> nor <WG3777> seen <WG3708> His form. <WG1491>
"And you do not have <WG2192> His word <WG3056> abiding <WG3306> in you, for you do not believe <WG4100> Him whom <WG3739> He sent. <WG649>

"You search <WG2045> the Scriptures, <WG1124> because <WG3754> you think <WG1380> that in them you have <WG2192> eternal <WG166> life; <WG2222> and it is these <WG1565> that bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of Me;
and you are unwilling <WG3756> <WG2309> to come <WG2064> to Me, that you may have <WG2192> life. <WG2222>
"I do not receive <WG2983> glory <WG1391> from men; <WG444>
but I know <WG1097> you, that you do not have <WG2192> the love <WG26> of God <WG2316> in yourselves. <WG1438>

"I have come <WG2064> in My Father's name, <WG3686> and you do not receive <WG2983> Me; if <WG1437> another <WG243> shall come <WG2064> in his own <WG2398> name, <WG3686> you will receive <WG2983> him.

"How <WG4459> can <WG1410> you believe, <WG4100> when you receive <WG2983> glory <WG1391> from one <WG240> another, <WG240> and you do not seek <WG2212> the glory <WG1391> that is from the [one and] only <WG3441> God <WG2316>?

"Do not think <WG1380> that I will accuse <WG2723> you before <WG4314> the Father; <WG3962> the one who accuses <WG2723> you is Moses, <WG3475> in whom <WG3739> you have set <WG1679> your hope. <WG1679>
"For if <WG1487> you believed <WG4100> Moses, <WG3475> you would believe <WG4100> Me; for he wrote <WG1125> of Me.
"But if <WG1487> you do not believe <WG4100> his writings, <WG1121> how <WG4459> will you believe <WG4100> My words <WG4487>?"
